name: Skyward - Realm Above The Clouds
description:
Embark on an adventure above the clouds as you ascend through an archipelago of floating islands.  Will you successfully see the end of your journey or will you lose your footing in the process?

Features

  • Ascend through the realm to reach the highest point of the world in this vertically focused platformer.
  • Scuffle with the local wild life of the realm as you make the way to the summit of each level.
  • Utilize a variety of different skills to match your playstyle. Experiment with 8 unique skills and pick the one that matches your style the most.
  • Collect coins that can be traded with friendly poultry for power-ups.
  • Use the environment to your own benefit on your climb towards the summit. Within the realm you'll find strange objects that could be of great help to you... or cause great peril.
